channel.title: Exposure-X.Com OSRS PKING,High Quality!
channel.description:
[align=center]Hello,
Owner: Ryan Coder/Web Dev: Richard Server Type: ECO/PK Homepage: [B][U][url=http://www.exposure-x.com/]Home[/url][/U][/B] Forums: [B][U][url=http://www.exposure-x.com/forum]Forums[/url][/U][/B] Client Download:[B][U][url=http://www.exposure-x.com/client.jar]Client Download[/url][/B][/U]
Exposure-X The Management of the server is very professional, I have run a server for many years going back up to 4 years now. Exposure-X has high standards and will not tolerate anyone abusing the rules that have been set by Richard and Ryan,If you wish to go against are policy consquences will be put into place. We have currently just openned and are looking to build a community from scratch. We are a ECO and PK Server there is a lot of trial and error going on with our game but it has all features plus more that'd you will see on any server these days. We can happily say we have
Different game modes : Regular Legend Mode Iron man
Updates You can find all our updates at the forum either by following the link at the top of this or by pressing here! [b][u][url=http://www.exposure-x.com/forum]Website/Forums[/url][/b][/u]
Features
- AUTO VOTING SYSTEM/DONATION SYSTEM AUTOMATIC REWARDS! - Flawless Combat (Amazing Hit System) - Flawless Skills (Amazing for ECO skilling) - Slayer Tower (Great FUN) - Stable Economy - Rare Events - No Resets - Holiday Events - DOUBLE XP WEEKENDS/WEEKS - Donator SYSTEM - Good XP Rate (SET FAIR) - Growing/Friendly Community - Loads of Minigames/Features - XP Lamps (Working) - Random Events - No DUPES/SRS BUGS ( I WILL PAY YOU MONEY IF YOU CAN FIND SOME)
Features: [IMG]http://puu.sh/n0Vnk/2da6b53030.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/n0V5L/81b0b22537.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/n0UXu/ddb9fe9a01.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/n0V0W/2a6f3ebbcf.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/n0V1C/795a12a733.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/n0V2O/698b0860ad.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/n0V8w/18c2228c58.jpg[/img][/align]
